forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the city begins to embrace the evening under a partly cloudy sky. The air is soft, with a gentle southwest breeze weaving through the streets. The current temperature rests comfortably around the low fiftys, suggesting a night that is cool yet inviting. This atmosphere creates a canvas perfect for late-night strolls, the kind that invites reflection and appreciation of the city's vibrant edges.

As we look to tomorrow, the forecast reveals a mostly sunny disposition, promising a high near sixty-five. With temperatures gradually waning to around sixty-two, it seems the sun, tempered by the calming winds, will coax the best out of the day. Possible hints of a marine layer may appear, whispering in from the Pacific, but overall, clarity looks favorable for those wishing to explore the nooks and crannies of this spirited metropolis. Dressed in layers—a light jacket for warmth with a breathable base—you'll be well-prepared to savor the day, perhaps savoring a quiet coffee in a nearby café or wandering through one of the city's countless parks, soaking in the subtle hum of life that makes San Francisco so enchanting.
